title: Loading Screen troubles?

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
Is anyone else having trouble in loading screen?
Mine just wouldn't load_ (the little circle thing wasn't spinning, or was sometimes spinning very slowly)_ My internet was fine though, I could play youtube videos as a test.

After quitting and reconnecting several times i finally managed to join the game, to find our team like this.

Until i managed to get in, Illaoi was in a literal 1v5.
It was a normal game, but maybe we shouldn't play ranked just yet?

replies.body: My situation is even worse, I can only see 1/4 of the screen.
My client is zoomed in aswell :(
yeah same thing happening with me also fps was really low when finally got into game
